name: PERSONAL WEBSITE
desc: Built a portfolio website (this website hehe) using HTML/CSS/React.JS
Focused on design and usability across different platforms and devices, used Figma to create prototype of the website for multiple breakpoints

name: MERN BLOG
desc: Utilized MERN stack to locally develop a fully functional blog website, including a context API, user authentication, and the ability to search for and query posts by relevant tags
Deployed to the web using Herkou at mern-blog-msoul.herokuapp.com, currently working to add image uploading and storage in MongoDB using GridFS

name: SimpleYelp
desc: Developed Yelp clone that shows user information on retail locations populated by the Yelp API, parse user search to get results based on subject and location
Display results of the search query in a RecyclerView, designed elements in .xml file format to populate RecyclerView

name: MY MAPS
desc: Developed map tracker in Kotlin/Android Studio that displays a list of maps, each of which show user-defined markers with a title, description, and location
Uses Google Maps API to load MapView and Markers and utilizes device local storage to store marker coordinates and details
